trans-unit.source: Represents a WCF configuration element for a web service application.
trans-unit.target: 代表 web 服務應用程式的 WCF 組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpEndpointElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpEndpointElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether automatic formatting selection is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否開啟自動格式化選取。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if automatic formatting is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用自動格式設定。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of MIME content of the data sent by a web service operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 web 服務作業傳送之資料的 MIME 內容類型。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of a MIME content.
trans-unit.target: 字串，其中包含 MIME 內容名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new endpoint of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref> with the specified contract description.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的端點的型別<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref>與指定的合約描述。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> that specifies what an endpoint communicates to the outside world, including the signature of the operations in terms of messages exchanged, the data types of these messages, the location of the operations, and the specific protocols and serialization formats that are used to support successful communication with the service.
trans-unit.target: 型別的物件<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>指定哪些端點與外界溝通的外界，包括依據訊息作業的簽章交換這些訊息，作業的特定通訊協定和序列化格式，可用來支援成功進行通訊的服務位置的資料型別。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: A service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a condition is enabled that allows code injection into web pages viewed by other users.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否已啟用條件，允許程式碼插入其他使用者檢視的網頁。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用存取。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default format for responses sent out from a web service operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從 web 服務作業送出回應的預設格式。

trans-unit.source: A format object.
trans-unit.target: 格式物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得型別<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A type object.
trans-unit.target: 型別物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定內部伺服器錯誤時，是否產生 FaultException 的旗標 (HTTP 狀態碼︰ 500)，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果旗標已啟用; 否則會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether help is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否已啟用說明。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if help is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用說明。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the web service host name and URI matching rule that is configured in the binding element and used by transports such as HTTP, TCP, and named pipes when dispatching incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 web 服務主機名稱與 URI 比對規則，在繫結項目中設定並用於傳輸，例如 HTTP、 TCP 和具名管道，分派傳入訊息時。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated comparison mode.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的比較模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory allocated for the buffer manager that manages the buffers required by endpoints using this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的最大的緩衝區管理員會管理使用此繫結之端點所需的緩衝區配置的記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit representation of a number.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元數字的表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum buffer size to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要使用的最大緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: A number representing buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 表示緩衝區大小的數字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of messages that can be received by the web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可以由 web 服務接收的訊息數目上限。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit number representing a maximum quantity.
trans-unit.target: 代表最大數量的 64 位元數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的轉換<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>至<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to which web HTTP configuration settings are applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>Web HTTP 組態設定會套用。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的轉換<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>至<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to which web HTTP configuration settings are applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>Web HTTP 組態設定會套用。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes and verifies the format of a specified channel endpoint element and configures it to include web HTTP content.
trans-unit.target: 初始化並驗證指定的通道端點項目的格式，並將它設定為包含 web HTTP 內容。

trans-unit.source: The channel endpoint element to initialize and validate.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化及驗證通道端點項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes and verifies the format of a specified service endpoint element and configures it to include web HTTP content.
trans-unit.target: 初始化並驗證指定的服務端點項目的格式，並將它設定為包含 web HTTP 內容。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint element to initialize and validate.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化及驗證服務端點項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpEndpointElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>目前相關聯物件<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpEndpointElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A collection of configuration properties.
trans-unit.target: 組態屬性的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement"></xref> object that contains contraints on length and complexity of XML strings that are read by the XML dictionary reader.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement"></xref>包含 XML 字典讀取器所讀取的 XML 字串的長度和複雜度的條件約束的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains XML dictionary reader quotas.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含 XML 字典讀取器配額。

trans-unit.source: Gets an element that configures the security for a web service with endpoints that receive HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 取得與接收 HTTP 要求的端點設定為 web 服務安全性的項目。

trans-unit.source: A web service security element.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務安全性項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WCF method of transporting data across a network between endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定端點之間透過網路傳輸資料的 WCF 方法。

trans-unit.source: The three main transport modes are HTTP, TCP, and named pipes.
trans-unit.target: 三個主要的傳輸模式是 HTTP、 TCP 及具名的管道。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of transfer modes.
trans-unit.target: 傳輸模式的列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string to be encoded.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要編碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: Encoded text.
trans-unit.target: 編碼的文字。
